shared.title: IntellAgent Helpdesk
shared.restart-message1: So here we are, together sharpening a knife.
shared.restart-message2: IntelliAgent needs to restart to come out of install mode. Just restart it and you should get a login screen. (hopefully)!
shared.restart-message3: Alright. This entire install script is in
shared.restart-message4: Didn't I mention that? Anyway, there are a couple of options below to try and resolve the issue. There are some common pit falls and workarounds in the docs that may help. Submitting the issue will help identify any bugs in the script and will help others as well.
shared.restart-message5: I think I should submit this issue.
shared.restart-message6: I think i will start over.
shared.restart-message7: or maybe i should read the docs!

tickets.title: Tickets
tickets.subject: Subject
tickets.message-change-type: There're currently tickets assigned to this Ticket Type. Please select the ticket type you wish to reassign those tickets to in order to delete the ticket type.
tickets.warning-change-type: WARNING: This will change all tickets with type
tickets.issue-desc: Please tell us about the issue you're having.Remember to be as detailed as possible to ensure its resolved promptly.
tickets.after-submitting-message: Thank you for submitting your issue. An email has been sent to you with login details to view and create future tickets.
tickets.issue-created-message2: has been submitted. Please store the following information to access and update your ticket.
tickets.issue-created-message3: Please follow the link below in order to login and update or view the current status of this issue.
tickets.create-instruction: Please try to be as specific as possible. Please include any details you think may be relevant, such as troubleshooting steps you've taken.

messages.title: Conversations
messages.subject: Subject
messages.warn-not-valie: Please enter a valid message. Message must contain at least 10 characters.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.groups-desc: Please select a group for this user.
accounts.name: Name
accounts.upload-profile-image-desc: Image must be square and at least 256x256
accounts.api-token-for-mobile: API Token for the IntelliAgent mobile app.
accounts.create-account-desc: This wizard will walk you through the process of creating an account to access IntelliAgent.
accounts.user-info-desc: Please fill out the information below. All fields are required.
accounts.captcha: Please enter the letters you see above.
accounts.creating-desc: Please wait while we create your account.
accounts.creating-error-desc: Something didn't work out the way it should. Please try again or submit a bug report below.
accounts.submit-issue-text: I think I should submit this issue.
accounts.startover-text: I think i will start over.
accounts.readdoc-text: or maybe i should read the docs!
accounts.email-exists-text2: already exists. If you already have an account using this email please login and submit your ticket.
accounts.signup-login-text: Please click the button below in order to login with your email

reports.title: Generate Report
reports.tickets-by-groups-desc: Please select the start and end dates for the report and which groups to include in the report.
reports.tickets-by-prio-desc: Please select the start and end dates for the report and which priorities to include in the report.
reports.tickets-by-status-desc: Please select the start and end dates for the report and which status to include in the report.
reports.tickets-by-tags-desc: Please select the start and end dates for the report and which tags to include in the report.
reports.tickets-by-types-desc: Please select the start and end dates for the report and which ticket types to include in the report.
reports.tickets-by-users-desc: Please select the start and end dates for the report and which users to include in the report.
reports.name: Name

plugins.title: Plugins
plugins.name: Name
plugins.prompt-info: If you have permissions to access the plugins, they will display to the left in the sidebar.

settings.title: Settings
settings.default-ticket-type-desc: Default ticket type for newly created tickets.
settings.show-tour-desc: Tour the user interface on initial login.
settings.show-overdue-tickets-desc: Flash tickets that have been idle for a length of time.
settings.allow-public-tickets-desc: Allow the creation of tickets by users that are unregistered
settings.allow-user-reg-desc: Allow users to create accounts on the login screen.
settings.mailer-desc: Preferences for 27h7d Helpdesk to send email notifications to users.
settings.mailer-check-desc: IntellAgent Helpdesk will periodically check a mailbox for emails to convert to tickets. (Over IMAP)
settings.tps-desc: IntellAgent HelpDesk Push Server authentication for push notifications.
settings.log-desc: Main output log. All Errors are logged.

about.title: About
about.privacypolicy-desc: Paste in HTML / Text of your privacy policy.
